share_text: Download the Islam Way App to enhance your spiritual journey. Available on the Google Play
prayer_importance_1: Be diligent in performing prayers on time to find tranquility in your heart.
prayer_importance_2: Prayer unites us with Allah, so do not miss this opportunity.
prayer_importance_3: Do not miss the opportunity for direct communication with Allah: Prayer.
prayer_benefits_1: Your prayers are a light that illuminates your life and path.
prayer_benefits_2: Make prayer the pillar of your life and the foundation of your happiness.
prayer_benefits_3: Perform your prayers and start your day with peace of mind.
fajr_prayer: The Fajr prayer opens the doors of blessings in your day, do not neglect it.
prayer_is_pillar_of_faith: Prayer is the cornerstone of faith, so do not neglect it to comfort your soul.
relief_and_sweetness_in_prayer: In every bow, your worries lessen, and in every prostration, your life becomes sweeter.
peace_in_prayer: When you feel distressed, seek peace in your prayers.
rotate:
Rotate your phone until Kaaba is in
the center
about1: Welcome to the Tasbih Counter App! Our app is designed to help you keep track of your tasbih, zikr, and dua recitations. We understand the importance of maintaining a consistent and accurate count, and our app is here to make that process easier and more efficient for you.
about2: Our team consists of dedicated developers who are committed to providing you with a high-quality user experience. We value your feedback and suggestions, as they help us to continuously improve and enhance the app's features and functionality.
about3: Whether you're a seasoned reciter or just starting out, the Islam Way App is here to support you on your spiritual journey. We hope our app becomes a useful tool for you in your daily worship routine.
privacy_intro: At Tasbih Counter, we prioritize the protection of your personal information. Here's how we collect, utilize, and safeguard your data:
provide_access: Provide you with access to our app and features
personalize_exp:
Personalize your experience and provide targeted 
advertising
communicate:
Communicate with you about our app and other 
products/services
improve: Improve our app and its features
we_dont_sell: We don't sell or rent your personal information
we_may_share:
We may share your info with third-party service 
providers
we_may_share2:
We may share your info when required by law or to 
protect our rights or the rights of others
reasonable:
We take reasonable measures to protect your personal 
information
we_may_update:
We may update this policy and will notify you of any 
material changes
question:
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact
us at contact.alioui@gmail.com
onboarding_text2:
Maximize blessings, minimize distractions. 
Elevate your zikr with our app
onboarding_text3:
Find Inner Peace 
with Every Count
onboarding_text4:
Connect with the divine. Reach tranquility 
through our Tasbih Counter
onboarding_text6:
Track your zikr progress. Stay motivated 
on your spiritual journey
